setup.title: Ion Setup
setup.subTitle: Get the app credentials from my.telegram.org/apps and fill out the form. If you have 2FA enabled, you'll have to enter your password too.
setup.successInfo: Ion should be up and running. You can verify it with the "ping" command.

settings.contributorsInfo: Thanks to anyone who brought Ion here.

scope.groupAndChannel: Works only in groups and channels

ping.name: Ping
ping.info: This module will help you check if your bot is running or not.

config.displayLatencyInfo: Enable this if you want latency to be displayed in response.

afk.name: AFK
afk.info: Let others know that you are away from keyboard.

config.afkMessageInfo: Message to send when you are AFK. You can also include variables in your message, learn more.

shortlink.name: Link Shortener
shortlink.info: Generate shortcuts for any URL quickly.

eval.name: Eval
eval.info: Execute arbitrary JavaScript codes and get the result, supports asynchronouse functions.

spam.name: Spam
spam.info: Send repetitive messages to anyone, make sure to not spam frequently.

config.waitBeforeSendInfo: Adjust the time to wait before sending next message
